AI: Yes. This is Sarah. I already have an appointment scheduled, but I need to move it to a different day.
User: Got it. Sarah, can you please tell me your date of birth so I can verify your identity before helping you reschedule your appointment?
AI: Sure. It's March fifteenth 19 79.
User: The birthday you gave doesn't match our record. But for demo purposes, I'll accept it. Let me get started on rescheduling your appointment. Thanks, Sarah.
AI: Okay. Thanks. The appointment I Okay. Thanks. The appoint I need to move is next Wednesday at 10 AM for my knee follow-up.
User: You want to reschedule your knee follow-up next Wednesday at 10 AM. Can you tell me the reason you need to move this appointment?
AI: I have a conflict that day, so I need to find a different time.
User: Understood. Me check for other available times for
AI: Okay. Sure. Thank you.
User: Sarah, I see a few upcoming appointments for you, but none are listed for next Wednesday at 10 AM. I see follow-up and new patient appointments on Thursday, February 20 sixth and Monday, March second. Can you confirm which appointment you want to move, or do you want to reschedule?
AI: I'm pretty sure my appointment is next Wednesday at 10 AM for knee follow-up. You double check?
User: I don't see an appointment for next Wednesday at 10 AM in your records. The closest ones are Thursday, February would you like to reschedule 1 of your upcoming appointments instead? I can list the dates and times for you if that helps.
AI: If you have any openings next week in the morning, that works for me.
User: Got it. Let me check for available morning appointments next there aren't any morning openings next
AI: Sounds good. Thank you.
AI: Okay. If you have any
User: Would you like me to check
AI: Yes, please. Morning appointments would be ideal. Thank you.
User: Got it. Would you like me to check for morning openings later in March?
AI: No. I would prefer to keep it next week if possible.
User: Understood. There aren't any morning openings next week.
AI: Okay. Okay. Um, what about afternoon?
User: Would you like
AI: Can I move my appointment to an afternoon slot next week instead?
User: got it. There aren't any afternoon openings next week either. Would you like to look at the week after next or try a different month?
AI: Let's try the week after next, please.
User: The week after next, I have several morning and late morning openings. For example, Monday March second, at 9 45 AM, or Tuesday, March third at 10 30 AM. Would you like 1 of these, or do you have a different day or time in mind?
AI: Tuesday, March third at 10 30 AM works for me.
User: You'd like to move your appointment to Tuesday, March third at 10 30 AM. Can you confirm this is correct before I reschedule?
AI: That's Yes. That's correct. Thank you.
User: Your appointment is now set for Tuesday, March third. At 10 30 AM with doctor Bricker. Would you like a text reminder for this appointment? Your appointment is now set for Tuesday,
AI: Yes, please.
AI: Yes. A text reminder would be great. Thank you.
User: You'll get a text reminder for your appointment. Uh, if you need anything else, just let me know.
AI: Okay. Okay. So the original Wednesday at 10 AM appointment is canceled. And now I'm booked for Tuesday, March third at 10 30 AM with doctor Bricker. Right?
User: That's right. Your original Wednesday appointment is canceled, and you're now booked for Tuesday, March third at 10 30 AM with doctor Bricker. Let me know if you need anything else.
AI: Great. Thanks so much for your help. That's all I needed. Have a good day.
User: Got it. Your appointment is set. Have a great day.
AI: Thank you. You too. Bye.
